name: Shadow Walker
text: You can pierce the veil between the Shadow Plane and the Material Plane more often, and to greater effect.
benefit: You can expend one use of your shadow walk spell-like ability to use dimension door as a spell-like ability. Your start and end locations for this ability must be in dim light or darkness.
text_zh: 你可以更频繁并以更高的效果穿透阴影位面与主物质位面之间的障壁。
prerequisites_zh: 窃影鬼，‘行影术’类法术能力。
benefit_zh: 你可以花费1次以类法术能力使用‘行影术’的机会，并以此来通过类法术能力使用‘任意门’。不过使用该能力时你的起始与结束的位置必须在昏暗光线或者黑暗中。
